interests.title: Full Stack Development
interests.description: Building scalable end-to-end applications with modern frontend frameworks, robust backend APIs, and optimized databases.

interests.title: Algorithms & Problem Solving
interests.description: Solving algorithmic challenges and strengthening core computer science fundamentals through consistent practice.

interests.title: Databases & Data Modeling
interests.description: Designing efficient database schemas, optimizing queries, and working with both SQL and NoSQL systems.

interests.title: Software Engineering
interests.description: Applying clean code principles, system design patterns, and best practices to build reliable software systems.

interests.title: Application Security
interests.description: Exploring secure coding practices, authentication mechanisms, and vulnerability prevention in modern applications.

interests.title: Operational Security
interests.description: Understanding system-level security concepts, access controls, and secure operational workflows.

interests.title: DevOps & Automation
interests.description: Automating deployments, managing CI/CD pipelines, and improving development workflows through DevOps practices.
